text:
="preserve">Lissy Tempelhof (17 April 1929 – 10 October 2017) was an (East) German actress. She was born in Berlin, Germany. She was known for movies like "Alle meine Mädchen" (1980) and "Erscheinen Pflicht" (1984). She was married to actor Dietrich Körner.
Tempelhof died in Berlin on October 10, 2017, at the age of 88.
